com.mlt.desktop.icon

Class AbstractIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.icon.AbstractIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IconArrow, IconChar, IconClose, IconCubicCurve, IconDock, IconGrid, IconSquare

    public abstract class AbstractIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    Root of drawn icons. Offers the most common properties and prepares the graphics context to perform the paint.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • isBackgroundEnabled

        public boolean isBackgroundEnabled()
        Check whether automatic management of background is enabled. Default is true.

        When background is enable, if the icon is opaque, the background is automatically filled using the appropriate paint if the component is enabled, disabled or focused.

        Returns:
        A boolean.

      • setBackgroundEnabled

        public void setBackgroundEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set whether automatic management of background is enabled. Default is true.

        When background is enable, if the icon is opaque, the background is automatically filled using the appropriate paint if the component is enabled, disabled or focused.

        Parameters:
        enabled - A boolean.
